bug.author: Syphixs
bug.description:
Describe the bug ERROR: Invalid requirement: './bundled_pip_dependencies/' Hint: It looks like a path. File './bundled_pip_dependencies/' does not exist. To Reproduce <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33832024/101640948-6d825a80-3a31-11eb-9072-b108011c9632.png></denchmark-link>
Environment:
OS: 10.15.7 Python Version 3.7.9 BentoML Version 0.10

comments.comment:
found same issue in the 0.10.0 version. Describe the bug docker build failed To Reproduce cd ./20201209113627_677B50 docker build . <denchmark-link:https://github.com/bentoml/BentoML/files/5667441/20201209113627_677B50.zip>20201209113627_677B50.zip</denchmark-link>
Screenshots/Logs <denchmark-link:https://github.com/bentoml/BentoML/files/5667477/LOGS.TXT>LOGS.TXT</denchmark-link>
Environment: OS: MacOS 10.14.6 Python Version Python 3.7 Docker. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4483983/101661403-394d7080-3a16-11eb-8d47-7f0b146b3778.png></denchmark-link>

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Syphixs>@Syphixs</denchmark-link> Thank you for reporting. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/cryanzpj>@cryanzpj</denchmark-link> Thanks for the bundle and the log. I am going to check it out.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Syphixs>@Syphixs</denchmark-link> thanks for reporting this issue. This is a regression introduced in 0.10.0, we are working on a fix and will release a new version 0.10.1 including the fix later today.
This is now fixed in the new release 0.10.1, please skip 0.10.0 and update to 0.10.1, sorry about the inconvenience
